page.title: 02INTERVIEW
page.content: Is there a playgroud where the children can play? No,nowhere,the children just play around on the streets. How do people travel? Most people travel by bus but some people have cars. Which school do you go to? I go to Druridge Bay Middle School in Hadston. How do you get there? By coach which the school provides. How far is Hadston from Widdrington? Oh,about three to four miles. Isn't there a school in Widdrington? Yes, but only for the infants. What other buildings has Widdrington got? There is{a clinic,a co-op,a small {shop,a post office,a cub hut and a {club.Oh and a fish shop.
